lines.text: And I can still remember the day when Dinah said her first words... or was it Dana? 'Shiny peepeye no-no'. Whatever that means
It is simple. That means 'the bright circle is shining in my eyes and it hurts'.
Huh? How do you know that?
I am also a twin. Twenty seven of us hatched at the same time.
Really? Well... what does 'no-no Grampy three-dee grr' mean?
That means 'Do not make Grandpa Three-Horn mad'.
Are you sure about that one?
No. But it is good advice just the same.
I think I know who Doc is!
What's to know? He's a squinty-eyed old Longneck with no friends.
Me could have tell you that!
Who needs them? A lone dinosaur doesn't need anyone! Gee, I wonder if all the other lone dinosaurs talked out loud to themselves like this?
You talkin' to *me*? *You* talkin' to me? Who are you talkin' to? You sure you feel up to it, friend?
